title: Display gradient & Screen flashing
content: Have  brand new pixel 4a. With solid (black) wall paper and dark theme, see gradient on the top and bottom of display with solid wallpapers (cyan attached). Can't be burn in? Secondly, with display timed out when I get notifications, see sudden flash when notifications come up. Software issue or something wrong with display? Running Android 11. Have 7d return window, just noticed this. 5 days over. Thank you in advance for your time and help.
